Articles.Content:
Long time lurker first time poster!

I made a new SSTO! I call it the F-111 Gladius, as it is the first iteration of the ship and it took me 11 trials and errors to get it space worthy. This ship is capable of getting to a 100km and returning to KSC if flown correctly. She is a little on the heavy side however (coming in at 30t) so you will need to utilize the whole runway on this one. Technically itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not 100% done yet. I need to add some lights and a few other utilities but I really wanted to share this with everyone!

Engines: 4 Turbo Jet Engines, 2 Aerospikes

Once I find a place to upload the craft file I will update the thread.

If the above images don't load here is a link to the album. (new to linking images on forums)

http://imgur.com/a/jIaf9#0

Lol that doesn't look like an F-111 to me!

Lovely looking aircraft, but slightly confusing name.
Nice looking ship.. sort of like a diamond.
